title: MVP Race Hits A Fever Pitch
description:
Jalen & Jacoby break down the MVP-level performances from Joel Embiid and Nikola Jokic, who put in WORK last night. How close is this race, and who deserves the trophy? You'll be surprised to hear the answers! Plus! Luka getting chippy, Russell Westbrook has some thoughts on how Laker fans are treating his family, and Calvin Ridley gets at least a year-long ban for gambling on NFL games, but does the sentence fit the crime? And was the REAL crime making 8-team parlay bets? Tap in and split kings with guys. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
